Package org.ldaptive.transcode

Class AbstractStringValueTranscoder<T>

java.lang.Object
org.ldaptive.transcode.AbstractStringValueTranscoder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of object to transcode
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValueTranscoder<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractPrimitiveValueTranscoder, AbstractSchemaElementValueTranscoder, BigIntegerValueTranscoder, CharArrayValueTranscoder, DeltaTimeValueTranscoder, FileTimeValueTranscoder, GeneralizedTimeValueTranscoder, StringValueTranscoder, UUIDValueTranscoder
public abstract class AbstractStringValueTranscoder<T> extends Object implements ValueTranscoder<T>
Value transcoder which decodes and encodes to a String and therefore the binary methods simply delegate to the string methods.
